credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Design for Clock
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and yellow, brown, and green wash on white laid paper
description: Design for a large clock.  Intended to be executed in green and gilded bronze.  The dial is in the body of a vase which has a high foot and two female heads with horns as handles.  Inscriptions above and below.
name: Drawing
